name: qylon
description: AI Automation Platform - Transform manual business processes into intelligent, self-running systems

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:security" "npm run dev:meeting-intelligence" "npm run dev:workflow-automation"
scripts.build: npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:security && npm run build:meeting-intelligence && npm run build:workflow-automation
scripts.install:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../security && npm install && cd ../meeting-intelligence && npm install && cd ../workflow-automation && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.setup:env: cp env.example .env && cp services/api-gateway/.env.example services/api-gateway/.env && cp services/security/.env.example services/security/.env && cp services/meeting-intelligence/.env.example services/meeting-intelligence/.env && cp services/workflow-automation/.env.example services/workflow-automation/.env
scripts.db:seed: PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d qylon_dev -f database/seeds/01_subscription_plans.sql
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres redis mongodb && sleep 10 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.health:check: curl -f http://localhost:3000/health && curl -f http://localhost:3001/health && curl -f http://localhost:3004/health && curl -f http://localhost:3006/health

author: KD Squares Development Team
